description:
A small, lightweight replacement cartridge for the HyperFlow Microfilter. Because the filter uses Hollow Fibre Technology, where fibres are somewhat more brittle than traditional filter materials, we recommend packing a spare cartridge on longer trips – here it is.

  • Note: this is not compatible with the AutoFlow Gravity filter
  • Do not allow the cartridge to freeze after initial use
name: MSR HyperFlow Replacement Cartridge
